import React from 'react'; const PrivacyPolicy = () => (

Privacy Policy

Last Updated: 29th Aug, 2024

Welcome to vyvsai.com, your go-to platform for tender notifications. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard the data of our registered users, including those who subscribe to our services.

1. Information We Collect

We collect the following types of information:

  • Personal Information: When you register on our website, we may collect your name, email address, contact number, and other relevant details.
  • Subscription Details: If you subscribe to our services, we collect information related to your subscription plan, payment details, and usage patterns.
  • Usage Data: We may collect data on how you interact with our website, including pages visited, features used, and time spent on the site.

2. How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect to:

  • Manage User Accounts: To maintain and manage your registered account on our website.
  • Provide Subscription Services: To track and manage your subscription status, send notifications about tenders, and deliver any other services you have subscribed to.
  • Communication: To communicate with you regarding your account, subscriptions, and any updates or changes to our services.
  • Improvement of Services: To analyze usage patterns and improve our websiteâ€™s features and user experience.

3. Sharing Your Information

We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties, except:

  • Service Providers: We may share your data with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website and delivering our services, as long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.
  • Legal Requirements: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities.

4. Protecting Your Information

We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information:

  • Data Encryption: Sensitive data is encrypted both in transit and at rest.
  • Access Controls: We limit access to your personal information to those employees and service providers who need it to perform their job functions.
  • Regular Audits: We regularly review our data collection, storage, and processing practices to protect against unauthorized access.

5. Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access Your Data: Request a copy of the personal information we hold about you.
  • Update Your Data: Update or correct your personal information if it is inaccurate.
  • Delete Your Data: Request the deletion of your personal information, subject to any legal obligations that require us to retain certain data.
  • Opt-Out: Opt-out of receiving marketing communications from us at any time.

6. Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and we encourage you to review this Policy periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your information.

By using our website, you consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.

); export default PrivacyPolicy;
